title: FS: A few T206 F-G condition
author: statsfax

posts.post_title: FS: A few T206 F-G condition
posts.post_content:
I have a few T206s available for anyone who is interested. There are issues with most of them but a couple are generally OK. Feel free to make an offer for one or more--or all of them--via PM.

Here's what I have:

O'Leary, Detroit portrait (either miscut or trimmed--no name at bottom, name written in at top)
Perring, Cleveland
Jordan, Brooklyn
Moriarty, Detroit
O'Brien, St. Paul
Ferguson, Boston NL
O'Leary, Detroit hands on knees
Jones, Detroit

Any and all offers via PM will be considered. Thanks for looking!

--Dan

posts.post_title: FS: A few T206 F-G condition SOLD
posts.post_content:
This lot of cards has now been sold. Thanks to everyone for their interest!

--Dan
